alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 20 at 11:31AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER DOWNSTREAM OF KWETHLUK TO NAPAKIAK... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is possible. * WHERE...Along the Kuskokwim Delta including Akiachak, Bethel, Napaskiak, and Napakiak. * WHEN...Through Monday. * IMPACTS...The breakup front is near Bethel. Impounded water from ice jamming may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Ice jam flooding has high uncertainty. Impacts could range between localized high water and severe flooding. Now is the time to take precautions. Where possible, move items to higher ground and prepare your community for possible flooding. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Please stay tuned to weather.gov/Anchorage, NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
